Package org.hibernate.graph.spi

Interface RootGraphImplementor<J>

All Superinterfaces:
EntityGraph<J>, Graph<J>, Graph<J>, GraphImplementor<J>, GraphNode<J>, GraphNodeImplementor<J>, RootGraph<J>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RootGraphImpl
public interface RootGraphImplementor<J> extends RootGraph<J>, GraphImplementor<J>
Integration version of the RootGraph contract.

    • makeCopy

      RootGraphImplementor<J> makeCopy(boolean mutable)
      Description copied from interface: Graph
      Make a copy of this graph node, with the given mutability.

      If this graph is immutable, and the argument is false, simply return this instance.
